scenario_text.value:
Are you all right? You’re not hurt anywhere,
are you?
Yeah, I’m okay. Are you okay, Saki?
Yeah, I’m fine. I’m... I’m sorry.

I’m so sorry for being scared of you.
Promise you won’t leave me, okay?

I’m not sure I have what it takes to make
it here in this world all on my own...

What are you saying? I’m not going anywhere!
You’re the most important person in my life!
Thanks for being there for me, Floramon.
Sure! Thanks for keeping me around, Saki!
